meanings.definition: The beliefs, customs, arts, etc., of a particular society, group, place, or time.
meanings.sent1: Learning about different kulturs helps us understand diverse societies.
meanings.sent2: The museum showcases various kulturs from around the world.
meanings.sent3: In the play, the characters comically clash due to their contrasting kulturs.
meanings.sent4: Her family's kulturs were like a colorful tapestry woven with traditions.
meanings.sent5: The festival was a vibrant celebration of our shared kulturs.

meanings.definition: The cultivation of bacteria, tissue cells, etc., in an artificial medium containing nutrients.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study kulturs to understand how microorganisms grow.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician carefully monitors the kulturs in the petri dish.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria in the kulturs seemed to have a party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The tissue cells in the kulturs multiplied like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The growth of the kulturs in the lab was a fascinating process to observe.
